name: The Crash Test Dummies: "Puss 'n' Boots" Quiz | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: Complete the song title: "I'm The Man (That _______ Are Not)"
questions.explanation:
You.

	The chorus to this song is as follows: "You're in a jam You're tied up in knots And I'm the man That you are not Yes I'm the man That you are not."

questions.text: In "Everything is Better with Me", how does the singer describe his eyes?
questions.explanation:
beady.

	Brad Roberts is the lead singer for the Crash Test Dummies. The chorus to this song is as follows: "And I knowThat you'll seeEverything is better with meAnd I know That you'll findYou can't get me out of your mind."

questions.text: How many cats does Brad thank in the liner notes?
questions.explanation:
Three.

	According to the liner notes, three cats invaded Brad's apartment during the recording of "Puss 'n' Boots". Without those three cats, he claims, the record would not have been made.

Flying.

	"I wanna get that flyin' feelin' I can't leave it alone I wanna get that flyin' feelin' I can't leave it alone."

questions.text: In "Your Gun Won't Fire", how is the world?
questions.explanation:
Wired.

	"So don't bother tryin' Your whole world is wiredYou can set your sightsBut your gun won't fire."

questions.text: In "I'll See What I Can Do", how many times can the singer love?
questions.explanation:
Once or twice.

	"I could love you once or twice.I think you'd find it very nice.But then I'd have to call it quitsAnd tear your little heart to bits. I think you're gonna come with me.I think you'll like it, too.And when you beg me for some more,I'll see what I can do."

questions.text: In "I'll See What I Can Do", the singer has been watching someone.
questions.explanation:
True.

	"I watch at night, I've trained my sights right on youand I won't let you get away next time and when I finally get my hands upon youI know I'll make you want me one more time And if you wanna know what I wanna doJust ask me, I'll show youAnd if you think you know what I wanna doDon't ask me, I'll trust you."

questions.text: According to "Bye Bye Baby, Goodbye', how long will the dog be allowed to bark?
questions.explanation:
All night.

	"Take that dog and tie her upLet the bitch bark all nightFeel your trigger finger itchYou're spoilin' for a fight Cause now you're gone, And I'm lovin' itBye-bye baby, goodbyeI'm on my ownAnd I'm lovin' itBye-bye baby, goodbyeBye-bye baby, goodbye."

questions.text: Complete the song title: "I Never _________ That Hard".
questions.explanation:
Try.

	The chorus to "I Never Try That Hard" is as follows: "I never try that hard, so everything is easyAnd if I hold on tight, I only get dizzyAnd if I'm left alone, I can always please me."

questions.text: Complete the verse from "Never Bother Looking Back": "And I don't care and I don't mind/If I'm ______ or you're unkind."
questions.explanation:
unfair.

	The chorus to "Never Bother Looking Back" is as follows: "And I don't care and I don't mindIf I'm unfair or you're unkind'Cause right now I'm still kickin' backIt doesn't matterI never bother looking back."
